name: Across the Pond
description:
Game Overview:

Across the pond is a chill, turn-based strategy game. The goal of the game is to use a variety of aquatic animals to capture more than half the territory in the pond. We highly recommend that you play with a friend and experiment with the movements and interactions of each creature.

Credits:

This game was made by Dan Drory, Bretton Hamilton, and Jolanda Fiers
